Mignolet on Karius: "You can only speak about it if you are a goalkeeper yourself. ‘No individual is more important than the club."

Mignolet on Karius: "It won’t be nice for Loris but he is capable and professional enough to learn from it. You have to be mentally strong."

Mignolet on Karius: "We have Alex Manninger at the club & he has all the experience. I am 28 and I have been through it - it is not nice."

Mignolet on Karius: "You only get stronger from it. Especially at a club like Liverpool. One mistake gets really big out of nothing."

Mignolet: "No individual is more important than the club. Obviously for Loris it is not nice and I have sympathy but he will get stronger."

Mignolet on Karius: "We have to get through it & push each other. Competition will get us far. I want to look out for my own performances."

Mignolet: "I always try to be ready in this kind of period. I think about training for yourself - have to make sure you keep fit/healthy."

Mignolet: "You have to look after yourself, stay professional, keep your head down, work hard and off the pitch stay focused."

Coutinho could return to light training next week as the #LFC attacker steps up his recovery from an ankle injury. (James Pearce - Echo)

Coutinho is now off crutches & Klopp is delighted with his progress but insists he won’t take any risks with him. #lfc (James Pearce - Echo)

Klopp on Coutinho: “It would be cool (if he was available to face City). I won’t stop him. In this moment he is improving a lot." #lfc

Klopp on Coutinho: "He is off his crutches since the West Ham game, when we left the stadium he was walking in front without them." #lfc

Klopp on Coutinho: "I never rush a player back. I’m the most patient person in Liverpool. I always wait for someone. I can’t rush it.” #lfc

Klopp dismissed concerns that Joel Matip might need surgery on his ankle injury. #lfc (James Pearce - Echo)

Klopp says #LFC hadn’t made a final decision how to handle a problem which has been causing Matip pain for 3 weeks. (James Pearce - Echo)

If Matip isn’t fit for Monday then Lovren & Klavan are likely to be the Reds’ centre-back combination against Everton. #lfc (James Pearce)

Klopp on Matip: “There will be no surgery, there is not even a risk of it. It is only about resting the injury or not." #lfc
